title: Ticket #398: Problem if startd wants resource weights but negotiator does not
description:
Skimmed the resource weights patch [14512], looks like there's an issue if you don't have resource weights enabled in the negotiator but you happen to have the attributes on your machine ads.

This case should be tested and the code fixed if it is indeed an issue.
remarks:
2009-Apr-21 13:49:22 by alderman:
The attached patch should fix this issue.

2009-Apr-24 06:24:36 by tannenba:
Pushed the attachment into the master branch. Thanks.
attachments: • resource_weight_off_ok.patch 1619 bytes added by alderman on 2009-Apr-21 18:50:38 UTC.
check_ins: 2009-Apr-24 06:22   Check-in [14542]: Fixed problem if startd wants resource weights but negotiator does not. (gittrac #398) Committer: Todd Tannenbaum (By Ian Alderman )
